knownrelatives: Hildegund (wife), Alaric, Rolfe (sons), Flosi, Gudrun, Gunnhild (daughters), Kevin, Mick (adopted sons)
powers: As an Asgardian, Volstagg possesses superhuman strength and enhanced durability and endurance.
significantissues: Volstagg was among the Asgardians that left Asgard, in search of the missing Odin (Thor #255-263,1977)
his soul found by Thor after Ragnarok and brought back alive (Thor #4, 2007)
